explains: adv. 从何处；由此；到原来的地方

sentences.en: They returned whence they had come.
sentences.cn: 他们从哪里来又回到哪里去了。

sentences.en: No one ordered him back whence he came.
sentences.cn: 没有人命令他从哪里来回哪里去。

sentences.en: The straw began and said: "Dear friends, from whence do you come here?"
sentences.cn: 麦草开口问道：“亲爱的朋友们，你们从哪里来？”
